author: remm
msg: - Have CharCHunk implement CharSequence, so that a CharChunk can be given to a Java 5 regexp matcher
without having to do a useless toString on it first. Typically, it would be the URL.
- For some reason Costin refused this a while ago. Maybe there was a misunderstanding as to what
the proposed change was about, as there's no functional change to CharChunk.

msg: - remove mention of XML in this file and add a link the list of programming languages
